about_the_game:
Green Empire is a top-down action RPG set in the most endangered environments of our planet.

Play as the last polar bear and set out on an epic journey across Earth’s most threatened habitats with one quest: fight environmental disasters and climate change.

REPLAYABILITY

Protect the world through infinitely replayable scenarios battling to save Earth’s most threatened habitats.
The game’s mechanics are designed to mirror real-world environmental challenges on both local and global scales. Your actions in each map ripple outward, affecting the planet as a whole. Global warming evolves dynamically, influencing future maps and raising the stakes as you fight to restore balance.

THE CHALLENGES

Engage in an ongoing struggle to restore our planet's ecosystems. Face environmental challenges unique to each country like deforestation, poaching or pollution. Take a stance against the powerful corporations exploiting the natural resources and use different strategies. 

SURVIVAL

Green Empire currently features a thrilling survival mode where every step challenges your strategy. Unlock new countries as you advance, each with unique environmental crises, tougher maps, and powerful corporations to confront. Adapt to evolving objectives and escalating challenges in your fight to protect the planet.

REAL LIFE IMPACT

Green Empire aims to raise awareness about the urgent environmental crisis, challenging players to reflect on humanity’s role in global warming and the ethical dilemmas we face in protecting our planet’s future.

But it doesn’t stop there—Green Empire is committed to supporting real-world environmental organizations and conservation projects worldwide, turning awareness into action.

Fight for our survival.
Play for change.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains mature content including pollution, deforestation, deaths and ecological destruction. 
These elements are designed to foster a deep emotional connection and raise awareness about the environmental crisis, but they may include imagery or narratives that some may find intense or unsettling.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 (4 GB) or Radeon RX
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i7-10700K or Ryzen 5 5500GT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 (8 GB) or Radeon RX
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Play as the last polar bear on an epic journey through Earth's most endangered environments. Take a stance against powerful corporations, fight climate change and protect the most threatened habitats through infinitely replayable scenarios. Fight for our survival and protect our shared future.
